attributes.action: Lower the age of Cervical Screenings
attributes.additional_details: If the age is lowered it will help put many women’s minds at ease, and potentially save a lot of lives.
attributes.background: The current age for a cervical screening (smear test) is 25. I think this should be lowered to 16 due to many women this age and older have symptoms & are unable to get a smear test due to there age.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Offer the smear test to over-16s
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574513
